name: Yadu Vasudev
content: Yadu Vasudev - I am a faculty member in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at IIT Madras. I work in the areas of sublinear algorithms, and computational complexity theory. Prior to joining IIT Madras, I was a postdoctoral fellow at TU Dortmund, working with Prof. Christian Sohler. Before that I was a postdoctoral fellow at the Technion, working with Prof. Eldar Fischer. I completed my PhD at Matscience, Chennai where Prof V. Arvind was my advisor.
